message: Comes with two preconfigured styles for Facebook and Google
One click install of new styles from http://userstyles.org
Manage multiple styles for every website
Styles can have slideshows which allows to randomly show a background image every time the page is refreshed or stay on your favorite image
Restyler can be installed on Firefox and Chrome. IE extension is on the way (for now it only works on IE8 using bookmarklets)
